messages.subject: RAli G. was  Brits resident in Virginia and Arizona...
messages.msgSnippet: ... I ll review it for ya. ;-) I didn t really find his earlier stuff that funny, but I was rolling on the floor laughing while watching his show last Friday.
messages.messageBody:
>>I came across it looking for reviews of the Ali G american-version show.>>

I'll review it for ya. ;-)

I didn't really find his earlier stuff that funny, but I was rolling on the
floor laughing while watching his show last Friday. He interviewd Newt
Gingrich and a DEA agent among others. Classic.

Life is good.
~Mary
